Title: Healthy Competition
Description:
More of my creche mates have been welcomed under Emberthal's leadership, but there are still tensions between the former Sundered Flame and the dracthyr we've hurt.

Fortunately, I think I've found a way to work out those tensions in a productive, dracthyrian method that will reinforce our bonds as evokers. Sparring!

Now, come on. Try me! We can show all these louts how it's done.
